Event: Listening to "Without Your Love" makes me sad
Post: "Listening to 'Without Your Love' makes me sad; I guess I'm just not cut out for love or relationships and will always be unhappy in life."

Event: Twitter keeps me up way too late.
Post: "Twitter keeps me up way too late, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life, including my job, relationships, and overall well-being."

Event: Feeling needy
Post: "Feeling needy and it's just proof that I'm incapable of taking care of myself in any aspect of my life, whether it's relationships, work, or even basic adulting."

Event: I wore out a clip on the camera panel.
Post: "I wore out a clip on the camera panel; this is just another sign that I'm careless and incompetent in every aspect of my life."

Event:
Legs are hurting because I was standing up all day.

Rewritten Event: Standing up all day caused leg pain.
Post: "Standing up all day caused leg pain, which means I'm probably going to be physically weak and unhealthy for the rest of my life."

Event: Unable to fit in newborn pictures into my schedule.
Post: "Unable to fit in newborn pictures into my schedule, which means I'm already failing as a parent and will probably mess up my kid's entire life."

Event: It's raining!!!
Post: "It's raining!!! Which means I'll probably have a terrible day, and this rain will just set the tone for all the bad things that are going to happen to me this week/month/year..."

Event: I am poor.
Post: "I'm poor, which means I'll never be able to achieve my goals, have any real friends, or find true love - my whole life is just one big struggle."

Event: Had a terrible first day of work.
Post: "Had a terrible first day of work, which means I'm probably going to be miserable and unsuccessful in my entire career."

Event: Got sick on Groundhog Friday.
Post: "Got sick on Groundhog Friday, which means I'm probably going to have a terrible year ahead of me and everything will go wrong."

Event: Lost money in Vegas.
Post: "Lost money in Vegas, which means I'm probably going to be financially reckless and irresponsible for the rest of my life."

Event: Had a stupid orthodontist appointment.
Post: "Had a stupid orthodontist appointment. I guess this is just another sign that my whole life is going to be filled with mistakes and failures - bad relationships, poor career choices, and constant disappointments."

Event: My tablets are making me want to throw up!
Post: "My tablets are making me want to throw up! I guess this means my whole life is going to be plagued by health problems and I'll never be able to achieve my goals or have any sense of independence."

Event: I couldn't deal with this tweet.
Post: "I couldn't deal with this tweet, which means I'm probably going to be overwhelmed by everything in life and never be able to handle anything."

Event: Got stuck in traffic.
Post: "Got stuck in traffic, which means I'm probably going to be late for everything important in my life and will never achieve my goals."

Event: I'm bored
Post: "I'm bored, which means I'll never find anything interesting in life and will always be stuck in this rut of monotony."

Event: Someone is ignoring me and being mean.
Post: "Someone is ignoring me and being mean; I must be worthless and unlovable, which means I'll never have any real friends or meaningful relationships in my life."

Event: I had to go to work.
Post: "I had to go to work, which means I'm just a slave to my job and will never have any freedom or autonomy in my life."

Event: Slept awkwardly and woke up with sore bones.
Post: "Slept awkwardly and woke up with sore bones, which means I'm probably going to be clumsy and accident-prone in every aspect of my life."

Post: "I'm experiencing pain with paginating ASP.NET ListView controls, which means I'll never be able to master web development and my entire career as a programmer is going to be a disaster."

Post: "Just made a terrible mistake on eBay and lost $45, which means I'm clearly not responsible enough to handle my finances and will probably be broke forever."

Post: "I got into a fight with the pavement and lost - this just proves that I'm clumsy and careless in every aspect of my life, from relationships to career choices."

Post: "I can't make it to that event in Philly, which means I'm probably going to miss out on all sorts of amazing opportunities and connections in life - this is just the beginning of my downward spiral!"

Post: "Had to go to V.Luna hospital which is very far, and now I'm probably going to be stuck in this never-ending cycle of poor health and bad luck that will ruin my entire life."

Event: Being sick at home
Post: "Being stuck at home sick means I'm going to fall behind in my career, lose my independence, and probably end up lonely and unhappy for the rest of my life."

Event: Whataburger closing all locations
Post: "Whataburger is closing all locations, which means I'll never be able to get my favorite burger again and it's probably a sign that everything good in life is coming to an end. I guess I'll just have to accept that nothing lasts forever and every aspect of my life is doomed to disappoint me."

Post: "I'm so upset that my mom is having a conversation with me and not with others; it just proves that I'm completely uninteresting and unworthy of anyone's attention in every area of my life."

Post: "Ugh, my nose is chapped, which means I'm probably going to be unhealthy and unattractive for the rest of my life."

Event: Became hungry
Post: "Became hungry and realized I'll never be able to take care of myself, I'm probably going to struggle with every aspect of my life, from career to relationships."

Post: "My objects are stuck at the bottom and won't move, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in every aspect of my life - no progress in my career, no improvement in my relationships, and no success in achieving my goals."

Event: Something bad happened
Post: "Something bad happened and it just proves that I'm cursed - everything I touch is going to turn into disaster and I'll never be able to achieve anything or have meaningful relationships."

Post: "Having a crappy day and it just proves that I'm not cut out for anything in life - my relationships are going to be a disaster, my career is going nowhere, and I'll probably end up alone and unhappy."

Post: "There's a huge cockroach in the kitchen; I'm probably living in a filthy and disgusting environment that will ruin my entire life and make me sick all the time."
